description: The Celtics had a 16-point lead in the second quarter, but a scoring eruption from Kyrie Irving has the Cavaliers up 3-1 after Cleveland won Game 4.

description: Die Cleveland Cavaliers haben Spiel vier der NBA-Halbfinalserie gegen die Boston Celtics für sich entschieden und sind in der Best-of-Seven-Serie mit 3:1 in Führung gegangen.

author: Jerry Bembry
description: J.R. Smith was the first to reach Kyrie Irving after the final buzzer, dapping up his backcourt mate before giving him a hug. From there the Cleveland Cavaliers, one by one, did the same, ending wi…
title: Kyrie Irving keeps the Cavaliers on point against Celtics
